300  inline unsigned int get_n_particles()const
301  {
302  return particles1_.size();
303  }
304 
311  void get_particle(unsigned int n, plValues &particle, plProbValue &weight)const;
312 
319  template <typename T>
320  void get_particle(unsigned int n, T *particle, plProbValue &weight)const
321  {
322  if(n < get_n_particles()){
323 
324  const plDataValues &p = (*current_particles_)[n];
325  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < state_dim_; ++i){
326  particle[i] = p[i];
327  }
328  weight = weights_[n];
329  }
330  }
331 
339  template <typename T>
340  void get_particle(unsigned int n, std::vector<T> &particle, plProbValue &weight)const
341  {
342  particle.resize(state_dim_);
343  get_particle(n, &particle[0], weight);
344  }
345 
346 
350  const std::vector<plProbValue> &get_weights()const
351  {
352  return weights_;
353  }

385  void Output(std::ostream& out)const
386  {
387  out << "plParticleFilter:" << std::endl
388  << "Observation model: " << PO_given_S_ << std::endl
389  << "Transition (prediction) model: " << PS_given_oldS_ << std::endl
390  << "Current particle set: " << std::endl;
391  print_particles(out);
392  }
393 
394  protected:
395  SPL_ACCESS2(plParticleFilter);

397  // System (dynamic/transition) model P(S | S_)
398  plCndDistribution PS_given_oldS_;
399  kplConditionalKernel *PS_given_oldS_at_kernel_;
400 
401 
402  // Observation model P(O | S)
403  plCndDistribution PO_given_S_;
404  kplConditionalKernel *PO_given_S_at_kernel_;
